Detailed Description

Structure to hold ntee configuration.

The settings structure centralizes all the configuration settings for the NTee instance. It stores values for the protocol to configure, port and output filename settings, plus holds a vector of strings which define the command to execute when starting the R side client.

Definition at line 23 of file Settings.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ntee::Settings::Settings (  )  [inline]

Initializes a default Settings structure.

The values assigned through the initializer are the default settings for the ntee program.
